name: Frameland - A Binary Tale
description:
Frameland is a retro inspired RPG brought into the modern age.
The story is not about you. You are just in it.

  • A sci-fi story
  • Tactical turn based battles
  • A mysterious world to explore
  • And much more ...

This is a Demo, around 45 minutes of playtime.
This game is still in heavy development, so if you encounter a bug, or have suggestions please leave them in the comments.

Thank you.

---

You can switch to fullscreen from the mainmenu -> Config
